headline.main: AFFAIRS ON THE UPPER POTOMAC.; PREPARATIONS FOR THE ADVANCE.

docs.lead_paragraph: This morning, and during the middle hours of the day, guns were repeatedly heard in the direction of Conrad's Ferry. At 3 o'clock this afternoon Gen. BANKS rode thither, and has not yet returned. It is surmised that the firing was from our guns to protect the operations said to be progressing there for crossing the river.
